text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text:
—— The wait is over! The script that shall divine your destinies… 
The final draft of "Tapestry of Farewells Everlasting"! Let it be 
etched into your hearts!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Hey, Gimlet! Is this [Young Girl]… my new role?

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text:
Indeed, it is! Inspired by the creator… in other words, the 
traits I posses, have been passed to this innocent girl. 
You're the new key to this script!

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text:
The mechanical doll embarks on the journey as always. 
In the past, it was for "absence"… but this time, it walks 
because it has found "presence".

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text:
—— Dear girl, bestow upon me your memories. 
For it is through memories… that we find beauty in farewells.

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text:
As a result, I've become a mere actor in name… A paradox 
so vividly present in absence… maybe that's just fine as it is.

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text: But this ending… Are ya content with it, Gimlet?

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text:
The essence lies in the sacred "farewell"… I've discovered 
the most exquisite conclusion for us to enact within our 
theater troupe.

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text:
For you see, it is no longer solely my creation. …It belongs to 
all of us, part of the theater troupe "Fortuna's Ovation".

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text:
Now, embrace the role the gods⁽ᴵ ʰᵃᵛᵉ⁾ bestowed upon you 
and show me what you're made of!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
—— Hey there, everyone! The catering's ready to go. 
Anyone ready for a break, just help yourselves!

text_block_list.name: Tap's Friend A
text_block_list.text:
Oh, thanks a bunch! Perfect timing! 
The set's just about finished, so y'all come take a look!

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text:
Oh～ my goodness gracious…! 
I never knew y'all had such fine taste!!

text_block_list.name: Tap's Friend B
text_block_list.text:
How rude! We gave it our all 'cause of you, Tap. 
When the gang's all here, we're unbeatable!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Hehe… Thank you all very much. 
You've been of great assistance.

text_block_list.name: Tap's Friend B
text_block_list.text:
Oh please, we're practically like family now, ain't we? 
We sure had ourselves a good time with all that youthful stuff!

text_block_list.name: Tap's Friend B
text_block_list.text:
Oh yeah, make sure to tell that prickly fella 
her design data was a real lifesaver!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Prickly fella? …You mean Shakur? 
Did something happen?

text_block_list.name: Tap's Friend B
text_block_list.text:
That gal provided all them fine details and numbers. 
Thanks to that, we were able to progress without any fuss!

text_block_list.name: Tap's Friend A
text_block_list.text:
And also for music, they done sent us some darn fine 
royalty-free tunes. We're a bunch of numbskulls, so, 
it was a mighty big help～

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text: Fyuuh! That gal sure knows how to make things classy!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
… You're right, indeed. 
She is truly… excessively kind.

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text:
What's up, Fine? Ya got that "found the treasure, 
but it's too darn big to carry out"… kinda face goin'.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
…… Hehe, it would be a mess if that were the case. 
Well, just a little while longer until the All Hooves' Festival! 
Please keep us in your good graces till the end!

text_block_list.name: Tap's Friends
text_block_list.text: Roger!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
—— Oh, look! They've put up a poster 
for Gimlet and the others' play!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text:
Wow, they look really cool…! Hey, let's go see it. 
—— Wait, there's something written here.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: To our valued guests, we kindly request that you come dressed in costumes to avoid falling prey to evil spirits. See you at the theater ——

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
—— Wow, there are already quite a few people here…! 
My heart is fluttering!

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text: So pumped up! …Oh, Shakur's all set too, they said.

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text:
Here we go! This performance is a one-time deal. 
There's no duplicating or replaying this unique moment. 
…… So let's enjoy it to the fullest!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text:
The curtain rises. 
―― It's showtime.

text_block_list.name: [Bard]
text_block_list.text:
… Ah, it seems tonight's stage is here. Ehem! 
Now, esteemed guests who have gathered here ——

text_block_list.name: [Bard]
text_block_list.text:
… Huh? Hey, hey, hey, I'm right here! Come on, lighting! 
Can't you see me? Are you seeing some ghostly horsegirls 
or something? Geez…

text_block_list.name: [Bard]
text_block_list.text:
Ah, that's more like it! Now then, once again, esteemed guests. 
Tonight's stage, to me, unfolds here… a run-of-the-mill tavern 
like in any old village.

text_block_list.name: [Bard]
text_block_list.text:
There's a certain joy in weaving tales for the merry inebriates! 
No matter how melodious the verses, they flow from ear to 
lips like a pristine stream.

text_block_list.name: [Bard]
text_block_list.text:
Forgive the tangent, and pray tell… why do you adorn 
yourselves in such peculiar guises? As devils, vampires, 
and nurses drenched in crimson, I dare inquire?

text_block_list.name: [Bard]
text_block_list.text:
… Ah, I perceive, 'tis the season of Hallowe'en! Yet, my friend, 
in this village, our Hallowe'en holds a peculiar grace. Are you 
not acquainted with the tales that weave its tapestry?

text_block_list.name: [Bard]
text_block_list.text: "On All Hallows' Eve, when realms converge, bridging the here and beyond, demons emerge. Seek refuge in shadows, for if they find you…"

text_block_list.name: [Bard]
text_block_list.text:
Pray, unveil to me, is the soul by your side but 
a transient companion of revelry, I wonder?

text_block_list.name: Audience Member
text_block_list.text:
By my side…? 
―― Huh, wha……!
—— Found you.

text_block_list.name: [Demon]
text_block_list.text:
You… are "alive". 
Hand over… your soul!

text_block_list.name: Audience Member
text_block_list.text: Hyaaa…… ——

text_block_list.name: [Bard]
text_block_list.text:
Oh? Art thou… a true demon! I have longed for thee! 
… From the depths of my soul!

text_block_list.name: [Demon]
text_block_list.text: … Huh? Who dares quench my fervor??

text_block_list.name: [Bard]
text_block_list.text:
Forgive the breach of manners, for my intrigue 
has lingered long. As a bard, the question persists: 
What tales unfurl within the domain of enduring demons?

text_block_list.name: [Bard]
text_block_list.text:
Would the Great Demon Lord share tales like drunken lore? 
Should you grace us with the most enchanting of narratives 
you hold, souls and such shall surely bow to your whims.

text_block_list.name: [Demon]
text_block_list.text:
… Bards, they've always been a touch unhinged, 
across the ages. Well, it doesn't matter, I was 
just beginning to grow weary of my toil anyway…

text_block_list.name: [Demon]
text_block_list.text:
—— What would you crave… Ah, yes. It was a bygone era… 
Let me share with you the saga of a certain monster's 
bittersweet farewell.
